name: ENDGAME: Survival
description:
Big group of people will be dropped into a desert island where they will have to survive. There are no rules, but there are advantages for the
ones that will fight and kill, every kill, a Contestant will be rewarded with Points that can be used to buy advantages like better guns and even vehicles
The only way to get rescued is by buying a rescue with credits.

- Explore a vast island

- Hunt animals for food

- Defeat enemies and take their loot

- Use guns and traps to protect your base

- Gather natural resources such as special minerals and wood to build survival tools and structures

- Build a base and tools to survive
